Module capstone
Package capstone

Class Project

java.lang.Object
capstone.Project
public class Project extends Object
Contains numerous non-static variables and represents the data stored for each Project the company has on file

  • Constructor Details

    • Project

      public Project(int projectNumber, String projectName, String buildingType, String adress, String erf, double totalFee, double totalPaid, String projectDeadline, Person architecht, Person contractor, Person customer, Person engineer, Person proj_manager, String completionDate)
      Constructor for Project class
      Parameters:
      projectNumber - for reference
      projectName - as title
      buildingType - for type of building
      adress - physical site address
      erf - the ERF number of the plot
      totalFee - the total amount being charged
      totalPaid - the amount paid to date
      projectDeadline - format is LocalDate compatible
      architecht - Person object with architect role
      contractor - Person object with contractor role
      customer - Person object with customer role
      proj_manager - Person object with project manager role
      engineer - Person object with structural engineer role
      completionDate - format is LocalDate compatible

      Returns:

    • generateInvoice

      private void generateInvoice(Statement statement)
      Generates and exports and invoice using the outstandingFee amount
      Parameters:
      statement - is the interface object for the SQL interface opened

    • finalizeProject

      public void finalizeProject(Statement statement)
      Generates an "invoice" and creates completed_projects entry, and then if no outstanding amount, changes the invoice_necessary value.
      Parameters:
      statement - is the interface object for the SQL interface openend

    • getIncomplete

      public static String getIncomplete(List<Project> projectList)
      Returns a string with project name and number for the objects not marked as complete
      Parameters:
      projectList - is a list of all Project objects
      Returns:
      string with simple details of all incomplete projects

    • getOverdue

      public static String getOverdue(List<Project> projectList)
      Returns a string with project name and number for the objects not marked as complete AND whose deadlines are passed
      Parameters:
      projectList - is a list of all Project objects
      Returns:
      string with simple details of all incomplete projects

      public String toString()
